sentence.text: Overall, 40 of the 73 ICA patients (55%) and 23 of the 56 kindreds (41%) carry mutations located in translated or untranslated exons of nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay. Eleven of the 43 kindreds affected by sporadic disease (26%) carry RPSA mutations, whereas 12 of the 13 multiplex kindreds (92%) carry RPSA mutations.

entity.text: nuclear-transcribed mRNA catabolic process, nonsense-mediated decay
